title: Kalagala
text:
Kalagala is a town in <a href="Central%20Region%2C%20Uganda">Central Uganda</a>. It is one of the metropolitan areas in <a href="Luweero%20District">Luweero District</a>. Other towns in the district include: <a href="Bamunanika">Bamunanika</a>, <a href="Bombo%2C%20Uganda">Bombo</a>, <a href="Luweero">Luweero</a>, <a href="Wobulenzi">Wobulenzi</a> and <a href="Ziroobwe">Ziroobwe</a>.
Location.
Kalagala is located approximately , by road, northeast of <a href="Bombo%2C%20Uganda">Bombo</a>, the nearest large town. This location lies approximately , by road, northeast of <a href="Kampala">Kampala</a>, the largest city in <a href="Uganda">Uganda</a> and the capital of that country. The coordinates of the town are:00 36 47N, 32 36 56E (Latitude:0.6130; Longitude:32.6105).
Population.
The exact population of Kalagala is not known, as of November 2010.
